doc:
Russell Thorndike https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russell_Thorndike 0 Arthur Russell Thorndike (6 February 1885, Rochester, Kent – 7 November 1972) was a British actor and novelist, best known for the Doctor Syn of Romney Marsh novels. Less well-known than his sister Sybil but equally versatile, Russell Thorndike's first love was writing and, after serving in World War I, he devoted himself to it. Arthur_Russell_Thorndike ( 6_February_1885 , Rochester , Kent – 7_November_1972 ) was a_British_actor_and_novelist , best_known for the_Doctor_Syn of Romney_Marsh_novels . Less_well-known than his_sister Sybil but equally_versatile , Russell_Thorndike 's_first_love was_writing and , after serving in World_War_I , he devoted himself to it .
